content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) with coal fuel
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric network with multiple poles covering area around (-6.5, 11.5) to (2.5, 8.5)

### Coal Mining Operation at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Copper Production Line at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Iron Production Line at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Multiple burner inserters at (6.5, 13.5), (10.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Lab for research

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in source container before attempting extraction
- Check container inventory contents before attempting to extract specific items

### Errors when inserting items without having them
- Verify item availability in agent inventory before attempting insertion
- Ensure required items are collected before insertion operations

### Production line stalling issues
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure continuous supply of raw materials
- Keep track of ingredient requirements for recipes

### Research facility issues
- Ensure consistent supply of required science packs
- Monitor ingredient shortages in assembling machines
- Maintain power supply for research operations
